title: Deception, Lies, and Other Bullshxt
description: Can Love conquer lies? How damaging can lies be to a relationship that's had years of love, years of loyalty, and years of friendship? Should a few lies be the undoing of it all? If a little lying and deceiving got you what you wanted and what you needed, what would you do? Find out how it all unfolds for this cast of characters in the beginning of this fiery series.
author: M.J. Sparks
